# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

The following versions of this project are currently supported with security
updates:

| Version | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| v0.1.x  | Yes       |
| v0.0.x  | No        |

If you are using an older version, please upgrade to the latest version when
possible.

---

## Reporting Vulnerabilities

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability in the project, **please
DO NOT open a public issue**. Instead, report it **privately and responsibly**
by emailing - `contact@jarmos.dev`.

When reporting please include:

- A description of the vulnerability.
- Steps to reproduce the vulnerability (if possible).
- Any relevant Proof-of-Concept (PoC) code or screenshots.
- A suggested fix (if you have one).

You should receive an acknowledgement within **48-72 hours** and a response
regarding the next steps at the earliest.

We appreciate the help you provided in keeping this project secure and safe for
everyone.
